[ library(queues) | The ECLiPSe Libraries | Reference Manual | Alphabetic Index ]

list_join_queue(List, OldQueue, NewQueue)

adds the new elements at the end of the queue

Description

adds the new elements at the end of the queue. The elements are added in the same order that they appear in the list, e.g. 
    list_join_queue([y,z], [a,b,c|M]-M, [a,b,c,y,z|N]-N).
